name: axe-applitools
description: Exploring the AI Driven Applitools Visual Regression Testing in Drupal Site

scripts.visual: as-a applitools npx cypress run --env grep=Visual --headless --browser chrome >file.log
scripts.json:api: as-a applitools npx cypress run --env grep=JSON:API --headless --browser chrome >file.log
scripts.test: as-a applitools npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome >file.log
